name: Cursed treasure
description:
!!! Try not to collide with anything because it might break the boat movement :D

Sail around the world, visit treasure islands to find some gold! Watch out the treasure might be CURSED and awful monsters might be guarding it.

You land on an island, fight off monsters and collect the treasure. You only can carry 1 treasure and you need to take it to "Port" on the map to sell it to be able to gather the remaining treasure.

Controls:

WSAD / arrows - movement

Spacebar / LMB - attack zombies

If you are interested in unity tutorials chekc out my YouTube channel. 

Sounds https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/pirate-game-sounds-pack-147...
